viewData.name: PhiHair Attachment 40x8mm - 60pcs
viewData.short_description: PhiHair attachments are a Phi hair extensions crucial element intended to insert the attached hair piece on the scalp. They provide a secure hold for a flawless and natural looking overall hair appearance.
viewData.long_description: PhiHair attachments are a Phi hair extensions crucial element intended to insert the attached hair piece on the scalp. They provide a secure hold for a flawless and natural looking overall hair appearance.
